articles.author: Rajni Singh
articles.title: Anant Ambani-Radhika Merchant’s Cruise Pre-Wedding Event: Bangalore’s iconic cafe serves south Indian food for guests on board; PICS - PINKVILLA
articles.description: Anant Ambani And Radhika Merchant's Cruise Pre-wedding Event Is Currently Underway In Europe, And Reports Suggest That A Eatery In Bangalore Is Serving South Indian Food On Board For The Guests.
articles.content: Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant are set to exchange vows on July 12, 2024. The pre-wedding celebrations of Anant Ambani, the son of Mukesh Ambani, and his soon-to-be spouse, Radhika Merchant, were … [+2044 chars]
